data.message: In Australia whistleblowers are hunted and destroyed like Feral animals by government workers and police green lighted informants or green lighted drug dealers these are the untouchables ,as they never face justice for any crime they commit  and it's fucked and unjustified what these government workers do to hide the corruption their involved in ..to earn their blood money they will commit murder or commit any crime they want as long as corrupt police have their hand out for money ..it's fucked how these government workers have a private one sided war against the public of Australia all in the name of greed ! while the government workers such as police are involved in murders and destroying people's lives and the government getting away with whatever it takes to make their blood money .it is shameful I know it for a fact as I'm a victim of  government workers at state and federal levels .It's fucked how I am treated as I been a whistleblower on nsw police for 12 years and it's still on going plus I'm used as bait for The Australian federal police with no protection and it's cost me everything from family to my businesses as police wanted me to sell drugs and I said NO .but their not happy with destroying me they want me dead for informing everyone Australia is one fucked up nation ...check out chevydave2800 at Twitter and you can see what I mean
